channel.title: CVE Feed for Juiker -- Juiker app
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juiker -- Juiker app

item.title: CVE-2022-39043|2024-08-03T11:10:32.444Z -- juiker -- juiker%20app
item.description: Juiker app stores debug logs which contains sensitive information to mobile external storage. An unauthenticated physical attacker can access these files to acquire partial user information such as personal contacts.

item.title: CVE-2022-38117|2024-08-03T10:45:52.820Z -- juiker -- juiker%20app
item.description: Juiker app hard-coded its AES key in the source code. A physical attacker, after getting the Android root privilege, can use the AES key to decrypt usersâ€™ ciphertext and tamper with it.
